name: Nerd Bus
description:
Synopsis

Try to land as many children as you can into the correct educational facilities before your bus is destroyed.

Controls
  • Hold left click to accelerate 
  • Press right click to launch a child

Made in < 12 hours for the Back To School Jam.

By JohnLee Cooper, Rachel Theil, Marty McDaniel, and Michael Guattery.

music by Wonderboi
